title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 128 - Work Within Highway Limits
content:

State Regulations
§ 128.1 - Applicability of related rules
§ 128.2 - Mains or conduits
§ 128.3 - Work within limits of department contract
§ 128.4 - Prohibited equipment

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 128

Statutory authority: Highway Law, §§52, 103, 230, 249, 250

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
